overview: Tim and Leon, two colored brothers, live a pretty quiet life until, one day, Pauline, Tim s mysterious admirer, reveals herself and slowly but surely hooks up with the duo. -- Tim & Leon is a film based upon a comic strip. Each page of the strip corresponds to a scene and each scene is done as a sequence shot. The actors playing in a minimalist way with an aesthetic close to the drawings creates a unique, original atmosphere. Tim & Leon is a fairy tale for adults, a love story to give us back the sense of the marvelous..
title: Tim & Leon
